original_title: メランコリック・ジゴロ / シトラスの風III
overview: Daniel a peniless gigolo and his friend Stan concort a plan to get rich by posing as the heir of the Norbert family. However when Norbert's daughter comes looking for her missing brother things get more complicated... (Takarazuka Cosmos Troupe, 2015)
title: Mélancolique Gigolo / Citrus Breeze III
